overview: A new production of Robert Ashley's 1991 opera, "Improvement (Don Leaves Linda," featuring Gelsey Bell, Amirtha Kidambi, Brian McCorkle, Paul Pinto, Dave Ruder and Aliza Simons.  Music Director: Tom Hamilton  Live Sound and Processing: Tom Hamilton  Stage Design and Lighting: David Moodey  Producer: Mimi Johnson  Presented at the Kitchen (New York), February 7 through 16, 2019. This video was recorded live by Iki Nakagawa (with Joseph Bacon and Al Foote III) on February 14, 2019. Audio recorded by Eric Sherman; remixed by Tom Hamilton.
tagline: an allegory for an individual's self-realization
title: Improvement (Don Leaves Linda)
